scripts.db:clean: yarn db:up && docker rm -f supertokens && ../../tools/scripts/drop_db.sh supertokens parker_postgres_dev && ../../tools/scripts/drop_user.sh supertokens parker_postgres_dev
scripts.db:restore-fixtures: yarn db:clean && yarn db:up && ../../tools/scripts/restore_fixtures.sh supertokens postgres://supertokens:supertokens_password@localhost:5432/supertokens?sslmode=disable && yarn db:migrate-up
scripts.serve: docker rm -f supertokens && docker run --name supertokens -e POSTGRESQL_USER="supertokens" -e POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD="supertokens_password" -e POSTGRESQL_HOST="host.docker.internal" -e POSTGRESQL_PORT="5440" -e LOG_LEVEL="${LOG_LEVEL:-WARN}" -p 3567:3567 --rm registry.supertokens.io/supertokens/supertokens-postgresql:11.0.4
